projectDescription:
Quizzes is a web application that allows users to create companies, generate tests for these companies, take the tests, and view testing statistics.

Key functionalities of the project include:

Company Creation: Users can create their own companies or join existing ones. Each company has the ability to create its own tests to assess the skills of employees or students.

Test Creation: Company owners can create tests, define questions, and provide answer options. Each question can have one or multiple answers, with one or several correct choices.

Test Taking: Users can choose available tests to take. During testing, they select answers to questions, and the system processes the results.

Testing Statistics: After completing a test, users can view their testing statistics, including the number of correct and incorrect answers, the overall score, and other important metrics.

Company and Test Management: Company owners have access to a management panel where they can view and analyze testing statistics of their employees or students. They can also add/remove tests and questions.
